job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: stronguThe RolebrbrustrongWe are looking for a highly motivated software engineer specializing in serverside web development that is also comfortable working with the entire stack frontend and infrastructure You will join a small expert team building serverside and frontend software for the systems that support sales and service for both vehicle and energy products You will also be working on developer tools improve productivity and empower developers across the company The ideal candidate will have a passion for building worldclass software and a track record of success creating highly and scalable software systems You will need strong software engineering skills excellent interpersonal communication and experience accepting and giving meaningful feedback on technical designs and pull requestsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Participate in requirements gathering technical specification and the design and development of complex software projectslili Work with product managers content producers QA engineers and release engineers to own your solution from development to productionlili Contribute to software architecture design development of software applications and integration into enterprise systemslili Design software architecture based on business requirements strategy and prioritieslili Promote software engineering best practices via example participation in code reviews building tools and documentationlili Be nimble and react quickly to changing business conditions and prioritieslili Leverage your existing skills while learning and implementing new technologieslili Interact with teams of engineers from multiple disciplineslili Participate in oncall rotation for the teams mission critical applicationsbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli BSMS in Computer Science or equivalent experience and evidence of exceptional abilitylili 2 years of working experiencelili Experience in NET Framework NET Core package management and dependency injectionlili Database experience MySQL Postgres SQL Server and good knowledge in query optimizationlili Experience with distributed architectures and REST APIslili Good unit testing and integration testing practiceslili AgileSCRUM Software Development Process experiencelili Exposure to Go Node NPM and other open source technologieslili Experience with continuous integration and continuous deliverylili Experience with Docker and Kuberneteslili Working knowledge of continuous deployment feature toggles logging metrics monitoring and alertinglili Excellent interpersonal communication skillsliul
